movies.title: Nichts als Ärger mit den Männern

biography.bio: Jule Ronstedt was born on April 21, 1971 in Munich, Germany. She is an actress and writer, known for Franzi (2009), Grave Decisions (2006) and The Last Employee (2010).
biography.name: Jule Ronstedt

biography.bio: Stephan Luca was born on July 3, 1974 in Stuttgart, Baden-Württemberg, Germany. He is an actor, known for Prisonniers des flammes (2007), Rabbit Without Ears (2007) and Zorn - Vom Lieben und Sterben (2015). He has been married to Julia Jüngling since September 12, 2006.
biography.name: Stephan Luca

biography.bio: Heidelinde Weis was born on September 17, 1940 in Villach, Carinthia, Austria. She is an actress, known for Meine Frau Susanne (1963), La morte de Beverly Hills (1964) and Liselotte von der Pfalz (1966). She was previously married to Hellmuth Duna.
biography.name: Heidelinde Weis

biography.bio: Rüdiger Vogler was born on May 14, 1942 in Warthausen, Biberach, Württemberg [now Baden-Württemberg], Germany. He is an actor, known for Alice in the Cities (1974), OSS 117: Lost in Rio (2009) and Kings of the Road (1976).
biography.name: Rüdiger Vogler

biography.bio: Billie Zöckler was born on January 18, 1953 in Celle, Germany. She is an actress and editor, known for Im Himmel ist die Hölle los (1984), Money (1989) and Go Trabi Go (1991).
biography.name: Billie Zöckler

biography.bio: Anian Zollner was born on February 21, 1969 in Burghausen, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for War Horse (2011), Les années du mur (1995) and Rohe Ostern (1996).
biography.name: Anian Zollner

biography.bio: Götz Otto was born on October 15, 1967 in Dietzenbach, Hesse, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Tomorrow Never Dies (1997), Iron Sky (2012) and Downfall (2004).
biography.name: Götz Otto

biography.bio: Katharina Müller-Elmau was born on September 13, 1965 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She is an actress, known for The Colony (2015), Vincent Wants to Sea (2010) and Crazy (2000).
biography.name: Katharina Müller-Elmau

biography.bio: Cecilia Kunz was born on December 15, 1971 in Kaiserswerth, Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Jagd auf den Plastiktüten-Mörder (2001), Verliebt in eine Unbekannte (1999) and Liebe pur (2000). She has been married to Sönke Wortmann since May 2002. They have three children.
biography.name: Cecilia Kunz

biography.bio: Holger Kunkel was born on June 16, 1965 in Berlin, Germany. He is known for his work on Europa Europa (1990), Die Wache (1994) and Alone (2004).
biography.name: Holger Kunkel

biography.bio: Hubert Mulzer was born in 1944 in Memmingen, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Wave (2008), The Baader Meinhof Complex (2008) and Beyond Silence (1996).
biography.name: Hubert Mulzer

biography.placeOfBirth: Bad Warmbrunn, Lower Silesia, Germany [now Cieplice Slaskie, Jelenia Góra, Dolnoslaskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Philipp Sonntag was born on December 18, 1941 in Bad Warmbrunn, Lower Silesia, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Lindenstraße (1985), The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014) and Vorne ist verdammt weit weg (2007).
biography.name: Philipp Sonntag

biography.bio: Michael Habeck was born on April 23, 1944 in Grönenbach, Germany. He is known for his work on The Name of the Rose (1986), Rocks (2003) and The Bourne Identity (1988). He died on February 4, 2011 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Michael Habeck

biography.bio: Stefan Lehnen was born in 1969 in Orsoy, Rheinberg, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Lotta in Love (2006), Strong Shit (1997) and Die Bademeister - Busen, Beton, Bieralarm (2001).
biography.name: Stefan Lehnen

biography.bio: Claudia-Sofie Jelinek was born on March 4, 1961 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Trois jours à vivre (2006), Hanna's Journey (2013) and Dutes on Duty (2008).
biography.name: Claudia-Sofie Jelinek
